content: I appreciate the tips. I'm actually thinking of auditioning for a production of "Hamlet" soon, and I was wondering if you could give me some advice on how to prepare for a classical audition. I had an amazing experience watching a production of "Hamlet" during a 10-day theater festival in the city a while back, and I got to meet the lead actor, James, who gave me some valuable tips on how to project my voice on stage.
